snippets.script:
<script>
    import {TimeStamp} from "@kahi-ui/framework";

    const timestamp = "13:00:42";
</script>

<TimeStamp hour="2-digit" hour_12 {timestamp} />
snippets.title: TimeStamp Custom Format

data.text: TimeStamp NOTE : Introduced feature in v0.4.10. TimeStamp formats an ISO 8601 / RFC 3339 timestamp into a human readable string, using the user preferences provided by the Browser. <script> import {TimeStamp} from "@kahi-ui/framework"; const timestamp = "13:00:42"; </script> <TimeStamp {timestamp} /> Imports <script> import {TimeStamp} from "@kahi-ui/framework"; </script> 12 Hour You can have the timestamp render as 12-hour time (1...12 AM/PM) instead of 24-hour time (0...23) via the hour_12 property. <script> import {TimeStamp} from "@kahi-ui/framework"; const timestamp = "13:00:42"; </script> <TimeStamp hour_12 {timestamp} /> Custom Format NOTE : By using custom format settings, the user's defaults will not be loaded and you will have to opt into each unit of information. You can customize how each individual component of the timestamp is displayed via the hour, minute, and second properties respectively. <script> import {TimeStamp} from "@kahi-ui/framework"; const timestamp = "13:00:42"; </script> <TimeStamp hour="2-digit" hour_12 {timestamp} />

TimeStamp.name: timestamp
TimeStamp.description: Sets the ISO 8601 / RFC 3339 timestamp being formatted for display.

TimeStamp.name: locale
TimeStamp.description: Alters the locale used for displaying internationalized text via RFC 5646 / BCP 47 language tags.

TimeStamp.name: hour
TimeStamp.description: Alters how a displayed hour is formatted.

TimeStamp.name: hour_12
TimeStamp.description: Alters to showing hours in 12-hour format.

TimeStamp.name: minute
TimeStamp.description: Alters how a displayed minute is formatted.

TimeStamp.name: second
TimeStamp.description: Alters how a displayed second is formatted.

data.render:
NOTE: Introduced feature in v0.4.10.

TimeStamp formats an ISO 8601 / RFC 3339 timestamp into a human readable string, using the user preferences provided by the Browser.

<script>
    import {TimeStamp} from "@kahi-ui/framework";

    const timestamp = "13:00:42";
</script>

<TimeStamp {timestamp} />

Imports

<script>
    import {TimeStamp} from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

12 Hour

You can have the timestamp render as 12-hour time (1...12 AM/PM) instead of 24-hour time (0...23) via the hour_12 property.

<script>
    import {TimeStamp} from "@kahi-ui/framework";

    const timestamp = "13:00:42";
</script>

<TimeStamp hour_12 {timestamp} />

Custom Format

NOTE: By using custom format settings, the user's defaults will not be loaded and you will have to opt into each unit of information.

You can customize how each individual component of the timestamp is displayed via the hour, minute, and second properties respectively.

<script>
    import {TimeStamp} from "@kahi-ui/framework";

    const timestamp = "13:00:42";
</script>

<TimeStamp hour="2-digit" hour_12 {timestamp} />
